Dgame.Graphic.Shader



struct Shader;
The Shader struct manages a OpenGL Shader instance The Shader can be loaded and compiled. But to use it, you must pass the Shader to the Program (see below).

Author:
Randy Schuett (rswhite4@googlemail.com)

enum Type: uint;
The supported Shader-Types

Vertex
To use as a Vertex-Shader

Geometry
To use as a Geometry-Shader

Fragment
To use as a Fragment-Shader

nothrow @nogc this(Type type, string filename = null);
CTor

const pure nothrow @nogc @property uint ID();
Returns the internal Shader ID

const nothrow @nogc void loadFromFile(string filename);
Load the Shader-Source from a file.

Note:
The Shader will not be automatically compiled, use compile to do that by yourself

const nothrow @nogc void loadFrom(char[] content);
Load the Shader-Source from a slice

Note:
The Shader will not be automatically compiled, use compile to do that by yourself

const nothrow @nogc bool compile();
Compiles the Shader

Returns if the compilation was successful

struct Program;
The Program struct manages a OpenGL-Shader-Program. Multiple Shaders can be attached to it. The Program links the attached Shaders and then they can be used.

Author:
Randy Schuett (rswhite4@googlemail.com)

nothrow @nogc this(const Shader[] shaders...);
CTor Takes multiple Shader instances and links them together

Note:
The shaders must be already compiled.

const pure nothrow @nogc @property uint ID();
Returns the internal Program ID

nothrow @nogc bool link(const Shader[] shaders...);
Links multiple Shaders together.

Note:
The shaders must be already compiled.

const nothrow @nogc void use();
Bind and use the current program

const nothrow @nogc void disuse();
Unbind the current program. It is no longer used.

const nothrow @nogc bool setParameter(string name, const float[] values...);
Set between 1 and 4 parameter and binds them to variables of the Shaders

const nothrow @nogc bool setParameter()(string name, auto ref const Vector2f vec);
Bind a Vector2f to a specific variable name of the Shaders

const nothrow @nogc bool setParameter()(string name, auto ref const Vector3f vec);
Bind a Vector3f to a specific variable name of the Shaders

const nothrow @nogc bool setParameter()(string name, auto ref const Color4b color);
Bind a Color4b to a specific variable name of the Shaders

const nothrow @nogc bool setParameter(string name, ref const Matrix4x4 mat);
Bind a Matrix4x4 to a specific variable name of the Shaders
